citation: Proclamation under the National Parks and Wildlife Act 1970 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the National Parks and Wildlife Act 1970

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, on the recommendation of the Minister and with the approval of each House of Parliament, by this my proclamation made under section 14(1) of the National Parks and Wildlife Act 1970 â€“

        (a) declare the land, the approximate area of which is specified in Column 2 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation and is indicated as shown bounded by heavy black lines on the relevant plan listed in Column 3 of that Schedule, to be reserved land in the class of nature reserve; and
        (b) give the relevant name specified in Column 1 of that Schedule to that reserved land; and
        (c) declare the land, the approximate area of which is specified in Column 2 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation and is indicated as shown bounded by heavy black lines on the relevant plan listed in Column 3 of that Schedule, to be reserved land in the class of State reserve; and
        (d) give the relevant name specified in Column 1 of that Schedule to that reserved land; and
        (e) declare the land, the approximate area of which is specified in Column 2 of Schedule 3 to this proclamation and is indicated as shown bounded by heavy black lines on the relevant plan listed in Column 3 of that Schedule, to be reserved land in the class of national park; and
        (f) give the relevant name specified in Column 1 of that Schedule to that reserved land; and
        (g) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day proclaimed under section 2(2) of the Regional Forest Agreement (Land Classification) Act 1998 .
21 December 2000

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment

SCHEDULE 1 - Nature Reserves

Column 1  Column 2  Column 3  Name of nature reserve  Approximate area (ha)  Plan No.  Africa Gully Nature Reserve  29.5  4999  Alma Tier Nature Reserve  34.1  5000  Andersons Nature Reserve  403  5001  Basin Nature Reserve  23.9  5002  Butlers Ridge Nature Reserve  2 885  4612  Cape Bernier Nature Reserve  1 145  5037  Dickinsons Nature Reserve  68.2  5002  Dry Creek East Nature Reserve  273.6  4611  Elderslie Nature Reserve  100  5003  Hardys Hill Nature Reserve  41.3  5010  Heathy Hills Nature Reserve  190  5003  Huntingdon Nature Reserve  55.5  5001  Pelham Nature Reserve  48.6  5003  Pelham North Nature Reserve  67.4  5003  Pelham West Nature Reserve  290  5002  Rocka Rivulet Nature Reserve  260  4613  Tinderbox Nature Reserve  72.55  5023
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  


SCHEDULE 2 - State Reserves

Column 1  Column 2  Column 3  Name of State reserve  Approximate area (ha)  Plan No.  Mount Barrow State Reserve  1 120  4598  Mount Pearson State Reserve  4 595  5493  St Columba Falls State Reserve  155  4596  Three Thumbs State Reserve  3 120  4615
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           


SCHEDULE 3 - National Parks

Column 1  Column 2  Column 3  Name of national park  Approximate area (ha)  Plan No.  Ben Lomond National Park  1 665  5004  Tasman National Park  1 050  4618
                                                                                                                                                              


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 December 2000

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
